# AdBlockingRecoveryTag

Representation of an ad blocking recovery tag. See https://support.google.com/adsense/answer/11575177.

## Properties

Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**error_protection_code** | **str** | Error protection code that can be used in conjunction with the tag. It&#39;ll display a message to users if an [ad blocking extension blocks their access to your site](https://support.google.com/adsense/answer/11575480). | [optional] 
**tag** | **str** | The ad blocking recovery tag. Note that the message generated by the tag can be blocked by an ad blocking extension. If this is not your desired outcome, then you&#39;ll need to use it in conjunction with the error protection code. | [optional]
